docs.snippet: MOSCOW, Nov. 24 (U.P.)--The Soviet trade paper Trud published today a Tass news agency dispatch from Montevideo sharply criticizing American policy in Latin America. This may be the start of a press campaign to reply to American criticism of Soviet...
docs.lead_paragraph: MOSCOW, Nov. 24 (U.P.)--The Soviet trade paper Trud published today a Tass news agency dispatch from Montevideo sharply criticizing American policy in Latin America. This may be the start of a press campaign to reply to American criticism of Soviet policy in eastern Europe and elsewhere.
